mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_id, name, phone, email, user_name, id_card, password, role, sex) values (#{userId},#{name},#{phone},#{email},#{userName},#{idCard},#{password},0,#{sex})
mapper.select: select * from t_user where user_name = #{userName} and password = #{password}
select * from t_user where name = #{name} and id_card = #{idCard} and phone = #{phone} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update t_user set name = #{name},id_Card = #{idCard},phone = #{phone},email = #{email}, sex = #{sex} where user_name=#{userName}
update t_user set password = #{password} where user_name=#{userName}
